# Hej

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

```

```{r}
#| echo: false

d <- palmerpenguins::penguins %>% 
  drop_na()


```


```{r}
#| echo: false

htmltools::browsable(
  tagList(
    tags$button("Download as CSV", onclick = "Reactable.downloadDataCSV('penguins', 'penguins.csv')"),

    reactable(
     d,
     elementId = "penguins"
    )
  )
)

```


```{r}
#| echo: false

d %>% 
  ggplot(aes(bill_depth_mm, bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  theme_minimal()

```







## Karta Majorna

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(
    lng=11.91605, 
    lat=57.69195, 
    label="Majorna"
  ) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron)
```
